title: Spectacular 900-sqft Top-Floor unit(Avail NOW)
description:
1501 N 31ST STREET, PHILADELPHIA, PA 19121
This spectacular 900-sqft Top-Floor Penthouse Corner Unit includes one gated & covered assigned parking space with 24 hrs surveillance security. As soon as you step inside this unit, you will notice the beautiful wide plank hardwood floor throughout the entire unit. 10 ft ceilings with 8 ft floor to ceiling windows brings in natural sunlight to light up the rooms. High-end window treatments with remote control. The magnificent gourmet chef kitchen features oversized center island, gas cooking range, commercial vent hood, deep farm sink, quartz countertop, coffee/bar area with a wine fridge. The open floor plan offers easy flows and the 178 sq ft Balcony outside the kitchen with wood deck expends the living space to outdoor! The primary bedroom has a large barn door with spacious custom built in walk-in closet shelves; the en suite bathroom showcases an oversized shower with tiled floor and walls. The primary bedroom also enjoys a private balcony for sitting area for the morning coffee. The other two bedrooms has a Jack-n-Jill full bathroom. Front loader washer & dryer. Don't forget the large roof top area offers an outdoor cooking, entertaining space, stunning city views, and a dog park. Bike and additional storage in the basement. The landlord pays for the gas, water, and condo fee. Tenant is responsible for all other utilities and renter insurance. Convenient location to major highways; close to trendy restaurants, stores, Fairmount Park, and center city.
Kitchen Features & Appliances
*Dishwasher
*Disposal
*Stainless Steel Appliances
*Island Kitchen
*Kitchen

*Range
*Refrigerator

*Walk-In Closets
*Furnished
*Garden

title: ►GORGEOUS REMODELED HOME, SS APPLIANCES, HARDWOOD FLOORING, FRESH PAINT,
description:
NOTE: Feel free to contact me if this is not what you are looking for, I may have other properties to pass by you.
CONTACT NUMBER:  show contact info
5 BEDS
1.5 BATH
1,822 SQUARE FEET
Spacious 5-bedroom home for lease in a convenient location, on a tree-lined block! This 3-story beauty is filled with natural light throughout, fresh paint and original details including lovely moldings and archways, grand stair banisters and gleaming hardwood floors. This property boasts a brick facade and nice sized front porch, leading to a vestibule with an additional interior door. The large living room with a decorative fireplace and coat closet leads to the formal dining room with a charming built-in. The renovated kitchen contains plenty of storage with ceiling height cabinets, stainless steel appliances and stylish subway tile. Just beyond the kitchen is a sizable mudroom, a powder room and back yard access. The second level consists of three generous bedrooms with plenty of windows and closets and a modern hall bathroom. The third floor has two additional bedrooms, a hall linen closet, and a birds eye view of the neighborhood. The unfinished basement is perfect for storage and has laundry and a workbench. Great location, a quick bike ride to University City, Drexel and University of Pennsylvania. Close to countless eateries, nightlife and great shopping. Steps to public transportation, the trolley and bus routes, making for a short commute to Center City and surrounding Counties. Close to Routes 76, 676, Kelly Drive and City Line Ave., near major thoroughfares, Girard and Lancaster Ave. Nearby points of interest include the Fairmont Section, Art Museum, Rodin Museum, Barnes Foundation, Belmont Plateau and the Mann Center...Numerous Parks, the School of the Future, Please Touch Museum, the Philadelphia Zoo and more!
If you'd like to know more information about this property, please send me a message.
Listed Courtesy, Compass RE,Cherryblossom Harrison

title: Large charming apartment
description:
Large, charming unfurnished 1-bedroom apartment on main floor of historic stone manor house.
Full kitchen with inner building entryway, dining room with fireplace, sunny living room with outside entryway, full bathroom with tub/shower, large bedroom with many windows and outside entry to deck, high ceilings throughout, tile floors in kitchen and bathroom and hardwood floors in all other rooms, ceiling fans in kitchen and three other large rooms, quiet building.
Located next to Washington Crossing PA, 3 miles north of easy access to I-295 (formerly I-95), short walk to Washington Crossing State Park and Delaware Canal State Park, and 1-mile walk to Delaware River and historic bridge to New Jersey.
Included in rent: central A/C and heat, water, sewer, and trash. Free laundry machines in building basement. No pet and no smoking policy. First and last months’ rent and security deposit required (total $4,500).

completely renovated and beautiful 2 bed 1 bath home located in Shohola! Whether you are looking for a starter home or that vacation getaway in the mountains, this gem fits the bill. Renovated from top to bottom, this home has a new roof, new front and back decks, siding, windows and doors, custom hand laid real natural stone, a new lawn and brand new septic!
